scripts.clean: docker ps -aq | xargs -r docker rm && docker system prune -af
scripts.clean:start: npm run clean && docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml up -d --build
scripts.backup: docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml exec app npm run raw:prod:backup
scripts.restore: docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml exec app npm run raw:prod:restore
scripts.dev:backup: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec app npm run raw:dev:backup
scripts.dev:restore: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec app npm run raw:dev:restore
scripts.prisma:migrate: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec app npm run raw:prisma:migrate
scripts.prisma:pull:dev: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec app npm run raw:prisma:pull:dev
scripts.prisma:push:dev: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec app npm run raw:prisma:push:dev
scripts.prisma:pull:prod: docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml exec app npm run raw:prisma:pull:prod
scripts.prisma:push:prod: docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml exec app npm run raw:prisma:push:prod
scripts.prisma:generate:prod: docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml exec app npm run raw:prisma:generate:prod
scripts.raw:prisma:push:dev: dotenv -e .env.development -- prisma db push && node scripts/prisma/push-views.js
scripts.raw:prisma:push:prod: dotenv -e .env.production -- prisma db push && node scripts/prisma/push-views.js
